summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3831 for the improvement of East 53rd Street, from 9th Avenue Northeast to 10th Avenue Northeast, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 47064, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
